metadata.title: RHSA-2019:3143: OpenShift Container Platform 3.11 atomic-openshift security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is Red Hat's cloud computing
Kubernetes application platform solution designed for on-premise or private
cloud deployments.

This advisory contains the atomic-openshift RPM package for Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 3.11.153.

Security Fix(es):

* atomic-openshift: OpenShift builds do not verify SSH Host Keys for the Git repository. (CVE-2019-10150)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: OpenShift builds don't verify SSH Host Keys for the git repository
